answers.answer: Hello,Polyuria  or frequent micturition is an important symptom of diabetes. Further gathering of ants around urine was one of the very early methods of investigating diabetes when there were no blood tests in picture. My sincere advice would be to consult a physician and get blood sugar tests(fasting and post prandial) and Hb A1c done to know the status of your diabetes.Hope it helps. Take care and regards.
i thank you in advance doctor. this is really a great help.

question: i started to frequently urinate every few minutes. (which i already ask here in the forum. thanks doctor).now i put a glass bottle in my room. because i don't want to go the the toilet frequently. now my problem is ants comes to my urine in the bottle. there are ants living in my room but they started to come to my urine.is it normal that ants drinks my urine. i search in the web and some info there stated that  i might have diabetes.i thank you in advance for your help doctor.
title: Ants in my urine
